companyName: Digital Brand Media & Marketing Group, Inc.
description: Digital Brand Media & Marketing Group, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, crafts, designs, and executes digital marketing strategies for various ad platforms and social media networks in Great Britain. The company provides pay-per-click advertising, search engine marketing and optimization, web design, social media, digital analytics, and advisory services. It serves entertainment, fashion, and sports industries, as well as automotive and ecommerce markets. The company was formerly known as RTG Ventures, Inc. and changed its name to Digital Brand Media & Marketing Group, Inc. in April 2013. Digital Brand Media & Marketing Group, Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in New York, New York.
